description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，张启龙的第二任妻子。
description.en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army, second wife of Zhang Qilong.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙的第三任妻子。
description.en: Third wife of Zhang Qilong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾与张启龙一同率部南下河南。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, who once led troops south to Henan with Zhang Qilong.

description.zh-cn: 曾任南京市副市长，张启龙曾协助其分管农业。
description.en: Former Deputy Mayor of Nanjing, assisted by Zhang Qilong in managing agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群团组织。
description.en: A mass organization for advanced youth led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1927年中国共产党在湖南、江西边界领导的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising led by the Chinese Communist Party in 1927 on the border of Hunan and Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略转移。
description.en: The strategic retreat of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训机构。
description.en: A cadre training institution directly under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中共中央机关事务管理局

zh-cn: 中共中央机关事务管理局

description.zh-cn: 负责中共中央机关事务管理的机构。
description.en: The agency responsible for the administrative affairs of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国人民抗日军政大学

zh-cn: 中国人民抗日军政大学
抗日军政大学第七分校

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的军事政治学校。
description.en: A military and political school founded by the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国共产党领导的武装力量之一。
description.en: One of the armed forces led by the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在黑龙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在辽东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Liaodong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在辽东地区的军事组织。
description.en: The military organization of the People's Liberation Army in the Liaodong area.

nodes.id: 中华全国供销合作总社

zh-cn: 中华全国供销合作总社

description.zh-cn: 中国全国性的供销合作社联合组织。
description.en: The national federation of supply and marketing cooperatives in China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会
en: 8th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 8th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党组织和干部工作的重要职能部门。
description.en: An important functional department of the CCP Central Committee responsible for organization and cadre work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1966年在中国农村开展的社会主义教育运动。
description.en: A socialist education movement carried out in rural China from 1963 to 1966.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1968年南京市的政府机构。
description.en: The government body of Nanjing City from 1955 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议江苏省委员会。
description.en: The Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中共中央组织，作为党中央的政治助手和智囊团。
description.en: An organization of the CCP Central Committee established from 1982 to 1992, serving as a political assistant and think tank to the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省下辖的县级市，张启龙的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Hunan Province, the birthplace of Zhang Qilong.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙出生于湖南浏阳。
description.en: Zhang Qilong was born in Liuyang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙于1932年与李贞结婚，后于1930年代离异。
description.en: Zhang Qilong married Li Zhen in 1932 and they divorced in the 1930s.

description.zh-cn: 傅平中是张启龙的第三任妻子。
description.en: Fu Pingzhong was Zhang Qilong's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙于1925年加入中国共产主义青年团。
description.en: Zhang Qilong joined the Communist Youth League of China in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙于1926年转入中国共产党，1933年被开除党籍，1936年恢复党籍直至逝世。
description.en: Zhang Qilong joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1926, was expelled in 1933, and had his membership restored in 1936 until his death.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，张启龙被开除党籍，并被撤销职务、罚做劳役。
description.en: In 1933, Zhang Qilong was expelled from the party, removed from his post, and sentenced to penal labor.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，红二方面军党务委员会恢复了张启龙的党籍。
description.en: In 1936, the Party Affairs Committee of the Second Front Army of the Red Army restored Zhang Qilong's party membership.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙早年参加了湘赣边秋收起义。
description.en: In his early years, Zhang Qilong participated in the Autumn Harvest Uprising on the Hunan-Jiangxi border.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙在秋收起义后曾随毛泽东转战赣南。
description.en: After the Autumn Harvest Uprising, Zhang Qilong followed Mao Zedong to fight in southern Jiangxi.

position.zh-cn: 供给部部长、党委常委兼统战部部长
position.en: Minister of the Supply Department, Standing Committee Member of the Party Committee and Minister of the United Front Work Department

description.zh-cn: 1934年，张启龙随红六军团西征，后担任供给部部长、党委常委兼统战部部长。
description.en: In 1934, Zhang Qilong went on the western expedition with the Sixth Army Corps of the Red Army and later served as Minister of the Supply Department, Standing Committee Member of the Party Committee and Minister of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙随红六军团参与了长征。
description.en: Zhang Qilong participated in the Long March with the Sixth Army Corps of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙于抗日战争初期抵达延安党校学习。
description.en: Zhang Qilong arrived at the Yan'an Party School to study in the early days of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

position.zh-cn: 党总支部书记、校管理委员会委员、第四部主任
position.en: Secretary of the General Party Branch, Member of the School Management Committee, Director of the Fourth Department

description.zh-cn: 张启龙曾任中共中央党校党总支部书记、校管理委员会委员及第四部主任。
description.en: Zhang Qilong served as Secretary of the General Party Branch, Member of the School Management Committee, and Director of the Fourth Department of the Central Party School.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙作为政委，与司令员文年生共同率领八路军南下第二支队到河南。
description.en: As political commissar, Zhang Qilong, together with commander Wen Niansheng, led the Second Southbound Detachment of the Eighth Route Army to Henan.

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月10日，张启龙调任新成立的黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: On May 10, 1949, Zhang Qilong was transferred to be the Secretary of the newly established Heilongjiang Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月，张启龙担任中共辽东省委书记。
description.en: In March 1950, Zhang Qilong became the Secretary of the CPC Liaodong Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中华全国供销合作总社

position.zh-cn: 副主任、常务副主任、党组副书记
position.en: Deputy Director, Executive Deputy Director, Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月，张启龙任中华全国供销合作总社副主任，后任常务副主任、党组副书记。
description.en: In August 1952, Zhang Qilong was appointed Deputy Director of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, and later became Executive Deputy Director and Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月，张启龙被选为中国共产党第八届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: In September 1956, Zhang Qilong was elected as an alternate member of the 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1958年9月，张启龙任中共中央组织部副部长，后任常务副部长，直至1965年1月被撤职。
description.en: In September 1958, Zhang Qilong was appointed Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee, and later became Executive Deputy Minister until he was dismissed in January 1965.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1965年1月，因《浏阳县革命史》的问题，中共中央决定撤销张启龙中央组织部常务副部长的职务，并将其调离。
description.en: In January 1965, due to issues related to the 'Revolutionary History of Liuyang County', the Central Committee of the CCP decided to remove Zhang Qilong from his post as Executive Deputy Minister of the Central Organization Department and transfer him.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙被撤职后，到山东泰安县和山西太谷县“蹲点”参加四清运动。
description.en: After being dismissed, Zhang Qilong was sent to Taian County, Shandong, and Taigu County, Shanxi, to participate in the Four Cleanups Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1965年10月，张启龙被贬往南京市任副市长。
description.en: In October 1965, Zhang Qilong was demoted to Deputy Mayor of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙在文化大革命中受到冲击，直至1972年9月获释。
description.en: Zhang Qilong was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and was not released until September 1972.

relationships.target: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月中共十一届三中全会任命张启龙为中共中央纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: In December 1978, the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP appointed Zhang Qilong as Deputy Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1980年6月30日，中组部报请中央书记处批准，正式为张启龙平反。
description.en: On June 30, 1980, the Organization Department reported to the Central Secretariat for approval and officially rehabilitated Zhang Qilong.

description.zh-cn: 张启龙曾任中顾委委员，至1985年9月不再担任。
description.en: Zhang Qilong served as a member of the Central Advisory Commission until September 1985.
